knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
df <- data.frame(x=0, y=0)
for (i in 2:250){
  df[i,1] <- df[i-1,1]+((0.69)^i)*cos(i)
  df[i,2] <- df[i-1,2]+((0.69)^i)*sin(i)   
}
ggplot(df, aes(x,y)) + 
  geom_polygon()+
  theme_void()

```
